Title: HR offer letter
ApiDescription:
This sample features:
  • Document generation
  • Bulk sending
  • eSignature template
  • Anchor tabs
Code flow:

View source file on our public GitHub.

  1. Define a bulk send list and dynamically generate it as a CSV file, containing metadata and a request body and recipient data.
  2. Create an envelope draft from the predefined template with create.
  3. Make a call to getEnvelopeDocGenFormFields to receive a list of the docGenFormFields on the document.
  4. Update the value of the docGenFormFields specified in the response of the previous step with the provided user offer data, then use the updateEnvelopeDocGenFormFields method to dynamically generate a personalized document with that data.
  5. Attach the bulk send listâ€™s listID obtained in step 3 to your envelope as a custom field named mailingListId.
  6. Initiate bulk send by calling createBulkSendRequest.
  7. The app displays a message notifying the user that the bulk send is complete, and the option to view/sign any of the sent documents.

Success.Message: The HR letters have been sent for signature.
